Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the 2S seed storage albumins family
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activity against Gram-negative Klebsiella sp. but not against E. coli, Proteus sp., Salmonella sp. and Xanthomonas sp. or against Gram-positive bacteria S.pyogenes, S. aureus and Rathayibacter sp. Has no antifungal activity.

Literature.Title: Bactericidal activity identified in 2S Albumin from sesame seeds and in silico studies of structure-function relations.
Literature.Author: Maria-Neto S, Honorato RV, Costa FT, Almeida RG, Amaro DS, Oliveira JT, Vasconcelos IM, Franco OL.
